dependencyGroupID.description: The group ID of the updated dependency

dependencyArtifactID.description: The artifact ID of the updated dependency

previousVersion.description: The version of the dependency before the update

newVersion.description: The version of the dependency after the update

versionUpdateType.description: The type of change between dependency version, following the SemVer terminology

dependencySection.description: The section in the POM file under which the updated dependency is declared.

githubCompareLink.description: The comparison link of the two GitHub tags that correspond to the old and new versions of the updated dependency.

mavenSourceLinkPre.description: The maven source links of the previous versions of the updated dependency.

mavenSourceLinkBreaking.description: The maven source links of the previous versions of the updated dependency.

updatedFileType.description: The type of the updated dependency.
